channel.title: Jacobr tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from Jacobr.

item.description: @healthbjk Like the 17 page progress note that says nothing because the template pre-filled enough-to-generate-a-99214, the everything bagel obscures the bagel itself - leaving the recipient wondering. We'll agree to disagree on this one, @healthbjk
item.source:markdown: @healthbjk Like the 17 page progress note that says nothing because the template pre-filled enough-to-generate-a-99214, the everything bagel obscures the bagel itself - leaving the recipient wondering. We'll agree to disagree on this one, @healthbjk

item.description: @tinaksharma Oy. 30 years ago, a medical school mentor (pulmonologist) told me I was "too smart" to be a family physician. A decade later, when we were faculty peers, I reminded him about this - and he was truly apologetic - promised: "never again." Hmmm.
item.source:markdown: @tinaksharma Oy. 30 years ago, a medical school mentor (pulmonologist) told me I was "too smart" to be a family physician. A decade later, when we were faculty peers, I reminded him about this - and he was truly apologetic - promised: "never again." Hmmm.

item.description: @healthbjk As a life-long Red Sox fan - I'm gonna stick with XML. True fans never give up. Also kinda rooting for underdogs like MQTT and YAML in the offseason.
item.source:markdown: @healthbjk As a life-long Red Sox fan - I'm gonna stick with XML. True fans never give up. Also kinda rooting for underdogs like MQTT and YAML in the offseason.

item.description: @Farzad_MD Confirmed. Dinner with a PCP recently (who joined an ACO - not ours (and not yours) during the ACO frenzy of 2022) ... "yeh - this thing is amazing. I sign up all of my patients, and the revenue just flows. So great." (not)
item.source:markdown: @Farzad_MD Confirmed. Dinner with a PCP recently (who joined an ACO - not ours (and not yours) during the ACO frenzy of 2022) ... "yeh - this thing is amazing. I sign up all of my patients, and the revenue just flows. So great." (not)
